column5: Started late Saturday afternoon, still lightly coming down. Approximately 4" of heavy wet snow, with more light stuff to come in the next week. Guess I should put the lawn mower away now.
ok sleds on the trailer ready to go. give me directions!!!!!!!lol

I guess you should Tom It's been a comfy +12 over here today    not that I'm complaining yet, but I sure can't wait for hard water to arrive If you need a shovel.... I have a spare one you can borrow Jacques
I fired up my old sled today and moved it into the back yard. Send some my way please.
and that's why they call it the great white north  and you can keep it for now..it will be here soon enough

we are putting the Blizaaks on my wife's Toyota Echo tomorrow... she is driving to Cobourg Thursday for a few days with my daughter. Better safe than sorry on that end of the province.  I will be heading up to the Huron shores region with the well worn all season's on my Caravan.  Not buying tires for this ol beast as I will soon have a "new to me" Dodge Ram 1500 that I am sure I will need a couple of snows for.

Yup....ole man winter is here.I'm at that point in the year that i want snow just to make it a bit brighter outside at nite.Fall is nice, but once the leaves are gone, then lets get it over with. SNOW dagnabit. I put up the christmas lites outside today. And, true to form, turned them all on just to spook the neighbours, who BTW, think i'm just another crazy english guy i'm always the first on the street. Snow means i can get the lawn chairs out and go sit in the yard in my winter coat and boots and giggle at the neigbours peeking through the window at me Life is grand!!!
Oh WOW! - I can hardly wait for that - only a little more then what you got!  Don
pleah!!!!!!!! white friggin crap has to come every year ...
Not fair,not fair at all. I want some of that down here. Not the heavy crap,the light snow.
Why is it that people live in canada and complain about the cold and the snow?????????  thats like buying a house right beside pearson airport, then complaining about the noise!!!!
